title: Bug 15899: Close all saved does not work all the time
OB: Using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, when attempting to close all editors, selecting 'Close All Saved' from the file menu does not have any effect.
EB: The 'Close All Saved' option should close all opened files that have no unsaved changes.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Open the application using build 20020508 with the latest UI code.
2. Create a new file named f1.txt.
3. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.
Expected result: All opened files with no unsaved changes should be closed.
Actual result: Nothing happens.
